Detailed Description

Configuration class for RankBasedAntColony.

Member Data Documentation

unsigned int RankBasedAntColonyConfiguration::elitist_ants

Number of elitist ants.

For example: if elitist_ants = 5 then the best-so-far ant and the top 4 iteration-best ants are allowed to deposit pheromone.
